title: Bltizcranks a joke Riot.
body: Thank you for buffing an already overpowering Champion to levels of stupidity.

replies.body: What buff, im not aware of any buff?
I'm not aware of any buffs. Blitzcrank was recently nerfed with W right?
They did re-buff the over nerf they did to it, but overall i'd say it's still a nerf.
